examples: I must finish this task before I can relax.
The sun rose before the moon set.
Debo terminar esta tarea antes de poder relajarme.
El sol salió antes de que la luna se pusiera.

suggested: Before the invention of the printing press, books had to be handwritten.
I'm so excited for the concert tomorrow! I can't wait for the band to come out and start playing. It's going to be even better than before!
I'll meet you at the coffee shop at 4:00, just like we arranged before.
She's always been my friend before anything else.
The runner finished the race before the others, and was declared the winner.
You need to fill out the form before you can attend the event.
The storm clouds rolled in before the rain started.
